title: What are the specifications of the iPhone 12 Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: The iPhone 12 family is rumored to come with OLED Super Retina XDR displays and features a Ceramic Shield glass cover on top. The new models are also expected to have Apple's A14 Bionic SoC that recently debuted with the new iPad.iPhone 12 Pro Max would provide triple rear cameras, with the third camera being a LiDAR sensor. The iPhone 12 Pro Max is also likely to have a unique super-wide-angle camera capability. For More Info About Apple Event Or iPhone 12, Click the below Link: Apple Event Today: How to Watch iPhone Launch Live Stream, Expected Price and Specifications
